Title: A Time to Kill at the Lumber Mill
Description:
Alright, let me see if I get all of this. The shipwright brings an entourage up here to get lumber for airships. 

But the shipwright is actually Order of Night, along with most of her group. So they murder the loyal Arathi, kidnap earthen, and force them to run the lumber mill up here.

And now we gotta deal with the Order AND whoever their new friends are.

<Kaerter swears and shakes his head.>

C'mon, let's head to the mill. We got a lot of bad guys to kill and time's wastin'.
ObjectivesText: Meet Lamplighter Kaerter outside of Skolzgal Mill.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Lamplighter Kaerter outside of Skolzgal Mill.
RewardText:
Nerubians. Lots and lots of nerubians.

By Beledar's Light do I hate nerubians.
